page.title: 14MARTLESHAM - CHURCH SERVICES
page.content: {The parish church of Martlesham} is outside the area and is isolated from all population centres of the village. At present there is no church at Martlesham New Village but services are held by the rector of Martlesham and Brightwell in the Pavilion. Besides the regular Sunday Service there is a Sunday School and a Mother and Toddler group. The parishioners at Martlesham are engaged in raising funds and it is hoped that eventually a church will be built at Martlesham Heath. The rector leads a busy life in this rapidly growing parish. He is in considerable demand for the conduct of baptisms, marriages and funerals. Afternoons are spent in visiting the elderly and the sick and most evenings are occupied with various meetings and committees.
